Quotes To Remember

updated: 30th of April 2022

published: 11th of December 2020

Intro

A great quote is worth remebering. Here are some that I have heard over the years that I like to keep readily available.

Compassion

Blowing out someone else's candle doesn't make yours burn any brighter.

- Unknown

Planning

The map is not the terrain.

- Jeff Sutherland

Everyone has a plan until they get punched in the face.

- Mike Tyson

Learning

Education is not the learning of the facts, but the training of the mind to think.

- Albert Einstein

I've forgotten more than you know.

- Johny Strangler

I'm not smart, i'm to stupid to give up.

- Brad Searle

Success

I have failed over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.

- Michael Jordan

Failure is a precursor to success.

- Unknown

Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.

- David Goggins

Sports

There are no limits. There are plateaus, but you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.

- Bruce Lee

Pain is temporary, glory is forever.

- Unknown

Software Development

The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.

- Dennis Ritchie

Make it work, then make it beautiful, then if you really, really have to, make it fast.

- Joe Armstrong

Time Management

Some people say they need 8 or 9 hours sleep in a day. I say SLEEP FASTER!

- Arnold Schwarzenegger

Sleep is for time wasters.

- Brad Searle

'Free' time doesn't exist. Time is something you earn. Don't waste the time you have earned.

- Brad Searle

Outro

Quotes can be a great inspiration. Go forth and concquer my friends.
